com.spectralogic.ds3.hadoop

Class Ds3HadoopHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spectralogic.ds3.hadoop.Ds3HadoopHelper

  • public abstract class Ds3HadoopHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class that defines Hadoop Utilities to transfer objects between DS3 and a Hadoop Cluster.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ds3HadoopHelper()

      static org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration createDefaultConfiguration(java.lang.String nameNode, java.lang.String jobTracker)
      This returns a Hadoop Configuration object with the 'fs.default.name' set to , 'mapred.job.tracker' set to , and 'mapreduce.framework.name' set to 'yarn'.
      abstract Job startReadAllJob(java.lang.String bucketName, JobOptions options) 
      abstract Job startReadJob(java.lang.String bucketName, java.lang.Iterable<com.spectralogic.ds3client.models.bulk.Ds3Object> ds3Objects, JobOptions options) 
      abstract Job startWriteJob(java.lang.String bucketName, java.lang.Iterable<com.spectralogic.ds3client.models.bulk.Ds3Object> ds3Objects, JobOptions options)
      Initiates a Ds3 Bulk Put with files that are stored in the Hadoop FileSystem.
      static Ds3HadoopHelper wrap(com.spectralogic.ds3client.Ds3Client client, org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem hdfs, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration)
      Wrap a Ds3Client with the Ds3HadoopHelper which allows for sending requests to a Hadoop Cluster to interact with DS3

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static Ds3HadoopHelper wrap(com.spectralogic.ds3client.Ds3Client client,
                                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem hdfs,
                                   org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration)
        Wrap a Ds3Client with the Ds3HadoopHelper which allows for sending requests to a Hadoop Cluster to interact with DS3
        Parameters:
        client - The Ds3Client to wrap
        hdfs - The FileSystem object for the remote Hadoop Cluster, typically backed by HDFS
        configuration - The base Hadoop Cluster Configuration

      • startWriteJob

        public abstract Job startWriteJob(java.lang.String bucketName,
                                  java.lang.Iterable<com.spectralogic.ds3client.models.bulk.Ds3Object> ds3Objects,
                                  JobOptions options)
                           throws java.security.SignatureException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  com.spectralogic.ds3client.serializer.XmlProcessingException
        Initiates a Ds3 Bulk Put with files that are stored in the Hadoop FileSystem. **Note:** this call does not send the objects
        Parameters:
        bucketName - The Ds3 bucket to send the objects to
        ds3Objects - The list of objects to send that are located in the cluster
        options - Options to control how the MapReduce job should behave
        Throws:
        java.security.SignatureException
        java.io.IOException
        com.spectralogic.ds3client.serializer.XmlProcessingException

      • createDefaultConfiguration

        public static org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration createDefaultConfiguration(java.lang.String nameNode,
                                                                              java.lang.String jobTracker)
        This returns a Hadoop Configuration object with the 'fs.default.name' set to , 'mapred.job.tracker' set to , and 'mapreduce.framework.name' set to 'yarn'.
        Parameters:
        nameNode - The url for the name node
        jobTracker - The url for the job tracker where map reduce jobs will be launched
